articles.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas celebrate Diwali at LA home. Spot their framed wedding outfits - India Today
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas hosted a party for their American friends on Diwali. She shared photos of them from their LA home, which was all decked up for the Diwali party.
